JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and ResponsibilitiesJob Summary :- Software Developer /Java developer.- 1 yr to 4 yrs of experience as Software Developer mandatory- 1+yrs of experience in Java and its frameworks.- Candidates will have an machine test in interview which will take 2 to 3 hrs depending on candidates capability- Local candidates only- F2F is mandatoryImmediate joinees.Job Description :A Java developer should be well versed with following Core Java Concepts :- OOPs Concepts & Patterns- Abstract Classes and Interfaces- Constructors- File IO and Serialization- Collections - List, Map, Set- Access Specifiers- Exceptions - Checked, Unchecked- Generics- Java Keywords - Static, Final, volatile, synchronized, transient, this super etc.- JVM and Memory Management- Multithreading and Synchronization- Dependency Injection.A network / distributed application, Candidate should have the following skills :- Knowledge of Protocols like IP, HTTP, TCP, FTP,UDP- Sockets, RMI, RCPA Java based web application. Candidate should know :- JSP / Servlets- Web Frameworks like Struts / Spring- Service Oriented Architecture / Web Services - SOAP / REST- Web Technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript and JQuery- Markup Languages like XML and JSON- Bootstrap IntegrationEvery Java Developer is expected to have Database Knowledge so he/She should know :- Working with Database like Mysql etc- SQL Queries - Inner Outer Joins, Group By, Having- Stored Procedures- Triggers- CursorsOther Skills required :- Search Engine Optimization- Payment gateway integration.- Service Oriented Architecture / Web Services - SOAP / REST- Web Technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript and JQuery- Markup Languages like XML and JSON- Bootstrap IntegrationEvery Java Developer is expected to have Database Knowledge so he/She should know :- Working with Database like Mysql etc- SQL Queries - Inner Outer Joins, Group By, Having- Stored Procedures- Triggers- CursorsOther Skills required :- Search Engine Optimization- Payment gateway integration

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
